text: Emmett Woodrow Morrison (August 24, 1915 – February 2, 1993) was an American professional basketball player. He played in the National Basketball League for the Warren Penns during the 1937–38 season and averaged 1.7 points per game. He left the University of Pittsburgh after his sophomore season to focus on his professional basketball career. ==References== Category:1915 births Category:1993 deaths Category:American men's basketball players Category:Basketball players from Pennsylvania Category:Forwards (basketball) Category:Guards (basketball) Category:People from Indiana County, Pennsylvania Category:Pittsburgh Panthers men's basketball players Category:Warren Penns players
title: Emmett Morrison
